daily_usage_pattern: 2-4h screen time; Messaging + browsing dominant; Rare gaming; WiFi preferred; Indoor 80%
rationale: Light users: Longest TTE baseline (25h from full). Dark mode: Zero cost, maximum relative gain (13.8% vs. 10.5% avg). OLED screens: 85% penetration in this segment.

daily_usage_pattern: 2-4h screen time; Messaging + browsing dominant; Rare gaming; WiFi preferred; Indoor 80%
action: Use WiFi instead of 4G/5G when available
rationale: Light users: Already on WiFi 80% of time. Remaining 20% (outdoor browsing): Switching saves 0.48h. Auto-switch feature: OS-level, no manual intervention.

daily_usage_pattern: 2-4h screen time; Messaging + browsing dominant; Rare gaming; WiFi preferred; Indoor 80%
rationale: Light users: 15-20 background apps (social media, news). Disabling sync for 10 non-critical apps: Saves 20mWh/day cumulative. Setup cost: 5min one-time configuration.

daily_usage_pattern: 2-4h screen time; Messaging + browsing dominant; Rare gaming; WiFi preferred; Indoor 80%
action: Use power saving mode proactively at 30%
rationale: ❌ Not recommended for light users: 35% CPU throttling degrades messaging UX (keyboard lag). Baseline TTE (25h) already exceeds daily needs. Emergency-only usage.

daily_usage_pattern: 4-6h screen time; Balanced usage; Moderate gaming (1h/day); 50% WiFi / 50% 4G; Mixed indoor/outdoor
rationale: Medium users: Screen time 5h/day → Screen power dominates (38% of total). Brightness reduction: Highest absolute TTE gain (1.68h). Adaptive brightness: Auto-adjusts outdoor, minimal UX loss.

daily_usage_pattern: 4-6h screen time; Balanced usage; Moderate gaming (1h/day); 50% WiFi / 50% 4G; Mixed indoor/outdoor
rationale: Medium users: Gaming 1h/day on 120Hz displays. Downgrade to 60Hz: -15% screen power during gaming. Trade-off: Casual games (puzzles) unaffected. Competitive FPS: Noticeable lag.

daily_usage_pattern: 4-6h screen time; Balanced usage; Moderate gaming (1h/day); 50% WiFi / 50% 4G; Mixed indoor/outdoor
rationale: Medium users: Navigation 1h/day (15% of usage). GPS off remaining 5h: Saves 200mW × 5h = 1000mWh. Background GPS (fitness trackers): Additional 150mW × 24h = 3600mWh daily. Permission management critical.

daily_usage_pattern: 4-6h screen time; Balanced usage; Moderate gaming (1h/day); 50% WiFi / 50% 4G; Mixed indoor/outdoor
rationale: Medium users: Mixed content (40% dark-friendly, 60% photos/videos). Dark mode effectiveness: 7.6% (lower than light users' 13.8% due to video-heavy usage). Still zero-cost win.

daily_usage_pattern: 6-10h screen time; Gaming 3h/day; Video streaming 2h/day; Frequent navigation; 30% WiFi / 70% 4G/5G; Outdoor 40%
action: Use power saving mode proactively at 30%
rationale: Heavy users: TTE baseline 9.8h (insufficient for all-day). Power saving mode at 30% SOC: +2.68h extends to 12.5h. Trade-off: Gaming performance -35%, but acceptable when battery critical. Profiles can auto-enable at threshold.

daily_usage_pattern: 6-10h screen time; Gaming 3h/day; Video streaming 2h/day; Frequent navigation; 30% WiFi / 70% 4G/5G; Outdoor 40%
rationale: Heavy users: 8h screen-on time. Brightness reduction: Largest absolute gain (1.96h). Outdoor usage (40%): Auto-brightness compensates, but manual override to 70% (vs. 100%) still saves 0.6h.

daily_usage_pattern: 6-10h screen time; Gaming 3h/day; Video streaming 2h/day; Frequent navigation; 30% WiFi / 70% 4G/5G; Outdoor 40%
action: Use WiFi instead of 4G/5G when available
rationale: Heavy users: 70% cellular usage (outdoor/commute). WiFi switching saves 4G overhead (300mW → 150mW) for 5h/day: 750mWh = 0.86h TTE. Public WiFi security: Use VPN (adds 20mW overhead).

daily_usage_pattern: 6-10h screen time; Gaming 3h/day; Video streaming 2h/day; Frequent navigation; 30% WiFi / 70% 4G/5G; Outdoor 40%
rationale: Heavy users: Competitive gamers. 120Hz→60Hz: High UX cost for FPS games. Recommendation: Adaptive refresh (per-app). Gaming: Keep 120Hz. Video/browsing: Auto 60Hz. Hybrid approach: 5.4h gaming @ 120Hz + 3h browsing @ 60Hz = Net 0.4h gain.

daily_usage_pattern: 6-10h screen time; Gaming 3h/day; Video streaming 2h/day; Frequent navigation; 30% WiFi / 70% 4G/5G; Outdoor 40%
rationale: ⚠️ Hardware recommendation: Baseline TTE (9.8h) insufficient for 10h usage. Software optimization maxes at +4.2h (43%) → 14h total. For 15h+ needs: External battery mandatory. 10000mAh power bank: 3.3× phone capacity = +200% emergency reserve.
